title: EchoAI Interview Copilot
description:
A unique conversation assistant that runs speech recognition LOCALLY on CPU - no cloud service required! Combined with GPT for intelligent responses, it's perfect for meetings, interviews, and presentations. 
✨ Key Features:
- Privacy-first: Local CPU-based speech recognition
- Dual audio transcription (mic + speaker)
- Real-time GPT-powered responses
- Fully offline transcription capability
- JSON export for conversation history

Note: Only GPT responses require an API key.
